snippet: Chris Andersen, Gustavo Ayon, Brandan Wright, Jared Jeffries and Earl Watson may be unheralded, but their contributions on defense are significant.
abstract: Chris Andersen, Gustavo Ayon, Brandan Wright, Jared Jeffries and Earl Watson may be unheralded, but their contributions on defense are significant.
lead_paragraph: As perception of N.B.A. defenders shifts further and further away from the standard box score, it is important to remind ourselves why measures like steals and blocks mattered in the first place. Those individual play results do not tell the whole story of defensive success and failure, but they do aptly describe possessions ended in the most spectacular - and effective - fashions.

headline.main: Singing the Praises of Five Unsung Defenders
